thread.title: Bored Panda compiles photos of animals at their angriest
thread.title_full: Bored Panda compiles photos of animals at their angriest

title: Bored Panda compiles photos of animals at their angriest
text: Share This hairless sphynx cat with menacing eyes looks incredibly angry being photographed so closely This black and white cat might appear to be quite cute and cuddly at first due to its size but when you catch sight of its face you'll quickly realise you don't want to cross it A small and fluffy puppy should be adorable but this little guy doesn't seem too pleased with the cameraman With his beak upturned, this bird is making it very clear that it isn't enjoying being photographed and wants to be left alone How can something so small be so scary? This little guy is giving the photographer evils as it looks up disdainfully at the camera This toad is telling the person to talk to the hand because they are sick of being stared at in their container This bird was asking for trouble when it decided to perch on this person's golf club when they were trying to play This cat looks like he isn't too happy about being caught in a downpour outside and is taking its anger out on its owner What are you looking at? This owl, with its one eye half-closed, appears to be trying to say something This goldfish looks perpetually unhappy due to its facial markings and simply swims around looking angry This little bird was trying to have a rest and give its legs a break but isn't happy to be interrupted It might be best to step away from the cooked chicken and give it all to the cat because judging by its facial expression, they mean business Is this little lizard angry or happy about the evil little plan they seem to have just devised in their head? This rabbit is angry about the lack of room in his container and is attempting to ignore the photographer Captured in what appears to be mid-scream, this pet proves that you don't have to be big to be scary This creature found in the woodland looks unhappy and having a camera shoved in its face hasn't particularly helped Another angry sphynx cat that prove they are the winners of the best scowl in the animal kingdom This dog is prepared to stand up on its hind legs to prove just how hungry he is and isn't afraid of its owner This goldfish has a tough-looking moustache and is swimming angrily towards the camera looking for a fight Read more: Share or comment on this article 6
